radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits; contour of the liver is smooth; no focal liver mass; main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow; no ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; common hepatic duct measures 4 mm; cholelithiasis without gallbladder wall thickening; pancreas appears within normal limits without masses or ductal dilation; normal echogenicity of spleen, measuring 10.0 cm; limited views of right kidney show no hydronephrosis; visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
